<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Takedown Expert](/Feats.aspx?ID=1448) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=318" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 60 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You've mastered combat practices that let you get up close and bring down perpetrators alive. You can use your Intelligence modifier on attack rolls when you [Devise a Stratagem](/Actions.aspx?ID=546) if you're using a weapon of the [club](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=5) group in one hand (like a [club](/Weapons.aspx?ID=2), [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12), or [sap](/Weapons.aspx?ID=37)), in addition to the usual weapons, and those Strikes qualify for your strategic strike. Additionally, you can make any of your Strikes [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) without taking the normal –2 penalty.
name: Takedown Expert
